CustomField.description: Total number of batches with a failure. A batch is considered transactional, so any unhandled exceptions constitute an entire failure of the batch. Pairs to the Number of Errors field on the AsyncApexJob object.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Total number of batches with a failure. A batch is considered transactional, so any unhandled exceptions constitute an entire failure of the batch.
CustomField.label: Failed Batches
